altTitles.ja: だらしないお姉さんを飼いたい

altTitles.en: I Want to Keep a Sloppy Woman

description.en:
One day, Haruto-kun, a junior high school boy who loves to help others, encounters a half-naked lady by the roadside!

Her room is a mess, she won't wear her clothes properly, and when she's drunk she does all kinds of risky things for a lady. Haruto just can't help but want to help her! Without realizing it, he's taken up the challenge of being this older girl's caretaker...?

Do you like a sloppy older girl who is even cuter♡ when she is unaware of her sexuality?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67169)
description.ja:
人助けが大好きな中学生男子・はるとくんは、ある日、道端で半裸のお姉さんと遭遇！ 部屋はめちゃくちゃ、服をちゃんと着られない、酔っぱらうと色々アブなすぎるお姉さんを助けたくてたまらないはるとくん!! 思わずお姉さんのお世話役を買ってしまい…!?

無自覚エッチでさらに可愛い♡ だらしないお姉さんはお好きですか!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Haruto-kun, um rapaz do liceu que adora ajudar os outros, encontra uma senhora seminua à beira da estrada!

O seu quarto está uma confusão, ela não veste a roupa como deve ser e, quando está bêbeda, faz todo o tipo de coisas arriscadas para uma senhora. Haruto não consegue deixar de a querer ajudar! Sem se aperceber, ele aceitou o desafio de ser o cuidador desta rapariga mais velha...?

Você gosta de uma garota mais velha desleixada que é ainda mais fofa♡ quando ela não tem consciência de sua  própria sexualidade?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67169)

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

description.en:
Yoh Asakura is a shaman–one of the gifted few who, thanks to training or natural talent, can channel spirits that most people can't even see. With the help of his fiancée, Anna, Yoh is in training for the ultimate shaman sports event: the "Shaman Fight in Tokyo," the once-every-500-years tournament to see who can shape humanity's future and become the Shaman King. But unfortunately for Yoh, every shaman in the world is competing for the same prize…


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (tankoubon) and Elex Media (kanzenban)

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002 - Go for 2006

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

altTitles.en: I Don’t Even Know His Name

description.en: Nanase Ayane is a young single mother and an omega. Despite her difficult circumstances, she enjoys a happy peaceful life with her daughter Rin. However, the halcyon days come to an end, when she crosses her path once again with the person who left an unfading mark both on her neck and life five years ago...

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん 外伝

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun - Kalego Gaiden
Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun - Kalego Side Story

description.en: A special, two-part side story manga set in the world of *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun*, focusing on Naberius Kalego during his days as a student of Babyls Demon School.

Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?

Ling Qi, a mischievous rabbit spirit, stole the Celestial Emperor's prized carrots and was punished with trials across three thousand lesser realms. In each realm, he diligently cosplays various roles, from pervert to villain, with one goal: sabotage the central couple! However, despite his intentions not to seduce anyone, his attempts often fail. As the trials progress, Ling Qi realizes that everything was manipulated by the Celestial Emperor…

altTitles.ko-ro: 차라리 내가 왕이 되는 게 나을 것 같다

altTitles.en: I Think It Would Be Better For Me to Become King

description.en:
Astarote is a young woman who is transported into a romance game that she loved. She takes on the role of the villain, who is married to Prince Cedric, her favorite character. However, she discovers that the end of the game is tragic for her, as she is accused of being an impostor and is executed by the king.

She tries to change her husband's destiny, making him become the new king, but in every route she ends up dying. Desperate, she decides to take radical action: she will become the queen and change the course of history. But to do so, she will have to face many obstacles, intrigues, enemies and secrets.
description.fr:
Je me suis finalement procurée le jeu que je désirais depuis longtemps. Alors que je profitais de ma vie avec Cédric, mon seul choix, au moment où j'ai appuyé sur la dernière option, [la reine Astarote, qui a osé prétendre être du sang royale du précédent roi, a été condamnée à mort !].
"Quel gâchis, si j'avais été à sa place, j'aurais fait mieux que ça !"
Et dès que j'ai dit ça, je suis entrée dans le jeu immédiatement.
"Au revoir, Astarote."
"Je veux juste que tu meures, Astarote."
J'ai essayé de nombreuses façons de faire de mon mari le roi, mais à la fin, j'ai toujours été confrontée à la mort. Je n'en peux plus.
"Si je continue ainsi, je serai toujours tuée, il ne me reste plus qu'une seule solution !"
"Je pense que ça serait mieux que je devienne ROI."
[Une nouvelle voie a été ouverte.]

description.en: During the Xiande period of the Dazhou dynasty, the Prince of Jianxing, Shen Wei, suffered defeat at the Chashi river in the northeast, leading to the Six Prefectures of Zhongbo almost falling to external foes. Shen Zechuan, meanwhile, was arrested and taken to the capital, to be the target of everyone's hatred as the surviving villain. When the young son of the Prince of Libei, Xiao Chiye, heard the news, he came and delivered a ruthless blow that nearly cost Shen Zechuan his life. Unexpectedly, the latter, who had seemed weak, was actually quite fierce, turning around and biting him, causing the former to bleed profusely. Henceforth, an enmity developed between the two, with the strife continuing both within and outside the court. Amidst this open and secret conflict, the true reason for Shen Wei's defeat was surprisingly discovered.

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

description.en: I am 30 years old, jobless and in despair, when I was invited to become a "Girls Bar Manager." So I entered the world of urban nightlife, and what awaited me was a very cute cast of girls. However, the owner had an ironclad rule for me: "Never touch any of the bar girls." I wonder if I will be able to stick to the rule...... This adult-themed romantic comedy takes place in a girls bar, a place of relaxation for gentlemen!
Keitarou, who's always had a disposition for attracting spirits, gets hired as a tutor for a little girl named Yayoi who can see spirits and is searching for the spirit that took away her mother.
description.vi: Keitarou, chàng trai có khả năng thu hút ma quỷ, được thuê làm gia sư cho một cô bé mang tên gọi Yayoi, người có thể trông thấy ma quỷ và đang trong công cuộc tìm kiếm con ma đã mang người mẹ của mình đi mất.

description.en:
"I thought life would be fun if everyone loved me."

An ordinary office worker became the count's daughter, Crocetta, whose charm value was 999 in a romance fantasy game. It's a shocking situation where people fall in love with you as soon as they make eye contact. Crocetta aims to reach the ending and to escape this game.

A libertine prince, a misanthropic duke, and a devout paladin—all the male leads here are somehow suspicious. Also, it seems like her charm doesn't work on them...? Will she be able to attack the male leads and reach the ending safely?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=11004208)

altTitles.th: นายเงือกของเดซาโรว

description.en:
Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

Official Translations:
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)

Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en:
After confessing my love at the end of our graduation ceremony, we accidentally met again in college.

Chan-ran, a piano prodigy, and Hye-joon, an ex-lover of Chan-ran. Hye-joon, who has not yet forgotten his brother who has committed suicide, looked like him.

Agitated by his voice, Hye-joon, who was drunk, slowly closed his eyes and fell into the temptation to sleep...

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé! The curtain raises on a romantic comedy of intertwined fates that begins with being switched at birth!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

altTitles.en: Me and Renee and Blue Skies

description.en: Souichi is an art student, and one day he saw an amazing painting at his university that made him want to study under the artist. When he went to learn from the master, though, the man did not accept him. Shortly afterward, he met the man's granddaughter, a blonde-haired, blue-eyed child called Rune. She was a very energetic kid who drew Souichi into playing with her in the surrounding countryside. Soon, Souichi learned the truth–the painting he had been so impressed with at his university was not the grandfather's work, but Rune's. She is the artist from whom he needs to learn!

The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daiyonshou - Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majou

altTitles.es: Re:Zero - Empezar de cero en un mundo diferente - Arco 4: El santuario y la bruja de la avaricia

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 4: The Sanctuary and the Witch of Greed

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活 第四章 聖域と強欲の魔女

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть четвёртая: Святилище и ведьма жадности

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero - Capítulo 4: O Santuário e a Bruxa da Ganância

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

altTitles.zh: 学園殺人ゲーム Dead Tube

description.en: Distributing thrilling videos in secret! A school game that puts life and death on the line!
description.kk: Мектеп оқушылары киноклубта не түсіреді? Күнделікті өмірдің бөлшектері, әуесқой қорқынышты фильмдер... бұның бәрі зеріктіріп жібереді... бірақ бұл жолы емес! Басты кейіпкер Томохиро Мачиге, киноклуб операторы, мектептегі қыз бірнеше күнге оны түсіруді ұсынады. Ол ерекше ынталы емес болсада, бірақ ол да бас тартпайды. Егер жігіт бұл оның өміріндегі ең қызықты және қорқынышты фильм болатынын білгенде...
description.ru: Что могут снимать школьники в клубе любителей кино? Зарисовки из повседневности, любительские фильмы ужасов… скука полная… но только не в этот раз! Главному герою Томохиро Мачии, оператору киноклуба, одна девушка из школы предлагает поснимать её несколько дней. Он особо не горит желанием, но и не отказывается. Если бы парень только знал, что это будет самый захватывающий и будоражащий фильм в его жизни…

description.en: Who am I? Where am I? What am I doing? Wait, wait! Great Alliance Leader! Stop it already!! I really…… am not the Cult Leader! The entirety of the Jianghu thought that the Cult Leader of the Demonic Cult was a woman—who would've thought that the Cult Leader could even secretly start a harem?!

altTitles.ja: ないしょのストーカーさん

description.en:
Kadoya is a resilient, hardworking, and gentle person, so he’s often pushed to do a lot of work.
He has this certain “secret”.
He is living strangely with someone he can't see.
When he comes home completely exhausted, there’s a hot bath and meal prepared for him.
And at night…
—— “He” comes to his side and holds him.
Kadoya feels so perfectly supported in everything, from housework to letting our sexual frustrations that it feels like he can’t live without “him” anymore...!

Lei Xi accidentally ends up in the wrong place at the wrong time while on an errand for his friend. He meets a strange woman who looks exactly like him who tells him to run before it's too late. Unable to escape, Lei Xi finds himself entangled in a cursed love story with the mysterious Qi Chen
description.fr: Alors qu'il voulait aider son colocataire, Lei Xi se rend, accidentellement, au mauvais endroit et au mauvais moment. Là-bas, il rencontre une femme étrange qui lui ressemble trait pour trait et qui lui dit de s'enfuir tant qu'il est encore temps. N'ayant pas réussi à s'échapper à temps, Lei Xi se retrouve embarquer dans une histoire d'amour maudite avec un mystérieux Qi Chen.

title.en: Flowers Blooming From the Palm of Your Hand

altTitles.es-la: Flores que brotan de la palma de tu mano

description.en:
Jaekyung, 'the son of a chaebol group who acts as a hobby' , can't forget the boy in his memory who keeps appearing in his dreams and disturbing his mind after meeting him once three years ago.

One day, I stopped by my cousin Tae-ha's office and encountered the boy swallowing Tae-ha's place (giving blowjob).
Suhyeon, a member of the popular idol group 'Midnight', said he was living on a sponsorship basis, so I went to him and said, "It doesn't matter what I do with anyone."
Jaekyung is engulfed in the urge to shake him up.
description.fr:
Seo Jaegyeong est un chaebol d’un riche groupe, et agit au gré de ses envies. Il ne peut néanmoins pas oublier ce garçon qu’il a rencontré il y a 3 ans de cela et qui continue d’apparaître dans ses rêves. En passant par le bureau de son cousin, Tae-Ha, il fait la ‘’rencontre’’ d’un membre du groupe Midnight, Su Hyeon, qui était en train de lui faire une petite faveur. Il déclare que celui-ci est son sponsor et qu’il agit en conséquence.
Seo Jaegyeong, choqué par ce qu’il se passe, est submergé par l’envie de le secouer.
	
Ndt : Lorsqu’un artiste dans le monde du spectacle, souhaite obtenir de gros rôles ou contrats, il tente de trouver un sponsor qui les trouvera pour lui, en échange de "faveurs" généralement sexuelles.
description.ko:
'취미로 배우 하는 재벌 그룹 회장 아들' 재경은
3년 전, 단 한 번 마주친 이후 자꾸 꿈에 나타나 마음을 어지럽히는
기억 속 소년을 잊을 수가 없다.
어느 날 사촌형 태하의 사무실에 들렀다가
그 소년이 태하의 그곳을 삼키고 있는 모습을 직면해 버리고 말았는데.
인지도 고만고만한 아이돌 그룹 '미드나잇'의 수현이,
스폰을 받아서 연명하고 있다기에 그를 찾아갔더니

"내가 누구랑 뭘 하든 무슨 상관이에요."

눈을 동그랗게 뜨고 대드는 수현.
심지어 재경을 기억조차 못하는 듯해 부아가 치민다. 
재경은 그를 흔들어 놓고 싶은 충동에 휩싸이는데..
description.es-la:
Jaekyung, hijo de un grupo chaebol y actor por afición, no puede olvidar al chico que conoció una sola vez hace tres años, que sigue apareciendo en sus sueños y perturbando su mente.  
Pero un día, pasa por la oficina de su primo y se encuentra con ese mismo chico haciéndole una mamada a su primo.

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.fr:
Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

---

description.id:
Kolaborasi yang luar biasa dari author "Noblesse" dan author "Girls the Wild's"! Kisah aksi fantasi mengenai Kaiden yang jiwanya masuk ke seekor kucing gendut dan Jiwoo yang suka menyembunyikan kekuatannya!

description.ja:
敵の不意打ちで深い傷を負い、猫の体に身を隠した覚醒者のカイド。猫好きの主人公・勇羽に助けられるが… 『ノブレス』 X 『少女ザワイルズ』作家らによる爽快アクション！

description.ko:
<노블레스> 손제호 작가와 <소녀더와일즈> 제나 작가가 만났다!
고양이 몸에 깃든 각성자 카이든과 각성능력을 숨겨온 고등학생 지우
러블리 2인조의 액션 판타지

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)

description.th:
เรื่องใหม่ของนักเขียน Son Je-ho จาก <โนเบลส> และ Zhena จาก <วีน เหวี่ยง WILD มัธยมสาวพันธุ์ดุ>! แอ็กชันแฟนตาซีสุดน่ารัก เรื่องราวของ "ไคเดน" ผู้มีพลังพิเศษแต่แฝงตัวด้วยการสิงอยู่ในร่างแมว และ "จีอู" นักเรียนหนุ่มทาสแมวแสนธรรมดาที่แอบซ่อนพลังที่ไม่ธรรมดาเอาไว้

超强觉醒者意外变身胖橘，
没想到铲屎官也有超能力!

description.pt-br:
Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

---

description.en: A cute girl came knocking at the protagonist's door, but for what reason may it be.
description.ru: Милая девушка постучалась в дверь главного героя, но по какой причине это вообще произошло?
description.vi: Một cô gái dễ thương gõ cửa nhà tôi, còn để làm gì thì tôi không biết.
description.pt-br: Uma linda garota veio bater à porta do protagonista, mas por que razão?

description.en:
Joo Hansol, a single 25-year-old virgin.
When I finally meet my dream ideal type, he says,
“I don’t do it with virgins.”
What?! I just have to lose my virginity?
On the mission to pop his cherry, Hansol makes a proposal to his childhood friend, Woobin, that crosses the line.
“Hey, what do you think will happen if we rub it together?”
At the time, I didn’t know what would happen…
description.fr:
Être vierge est-il une bonne ou une mauvaise chose ? Pour Joo Hansol âgé de 24 ans, c'est plutôt un problème. Pourquoi ? Parce qu'il a finalement réussi à trouver l'amour de sa vie, mais qu'il a été froidement rejeté parce qu'il n'avait pas d'expérience. Il s'est donc donné pour mission de perdre sa cerise. Mais ce ne sera pas si facile, surtout quand son meilleur ami est Do Woobin. Homme aux multiples talents, Woobin semble être le seul capable de contenir l'impulsif Hansol.
Hansol réussira-t-il à perdre sa cerise... ?

Ndt : ici le mot cerise remplace virginité, il permet un jeu de mot avec le titre.

title.en: Hajime no Ippo - The First Step

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

altTitles.ja: ヒョウ人 -BLADES OF THE GUARDIANS-

description.en: Escort refers to paid warriors. Their targets of protection are also referred to targets as they are wanted by the government. On the eve of civil chaos during the last years of Sui dynasty, with the rise of a reign of terror around the country, various peoples' feelings of grudge and animosity develop.
description.id: Mengambil latar belakang di akhir Dinasti Sui (581–618), munculnya banyak kekacauan di seluruh negeri. Dao Ma dan anaknya Xiao Qi, mencari uang dengan cara menjadi pengawal bayaran atau membunuh orang yang menjadi incaran pemerintah.

description.en: Stories of a city's inhabitants guarded by a magical girl, as well as her own stories and questions she answers.

A promiscuous rich young man, Choi Hyungseo, opens a flower shop with a light heart. However, when work gets busier than expected, he decides to hire a part-timer. Because of his high standards in appearances, Hyungseo repeatedly fails to find the right person for the job. He finally hires Jungwon who suits his taste, but… When Hyungseo attempts to seduce him, he realizes that Jungwon is prone to falling asleep when drunk and proposes a bet with him.
description.fr: Choi Hyeong-Seo, fils turbulent d'une famille aisée, décide le coeur léger d'ouvrir un magasin de fleurs. Cependant, la charge de travail devient plus important que prévu et pour y remédier, il décide d'engager un travailleur à temps partiel. À cause de ses exigences élevées en apparence, Hyeong-Seo n'arrive pas à trouver de candidats convenables. Il engage finalement Jungwon qui correspond à ses goûts, mais... Lorsque Hyeong-Seo essaye de le séduire, il se rend compte que Jungwon a tendance à s'endormir ce qui entraîne des développements inattendus.
description.ko: 문란한 부잣집 도련님 최형서는 가벼운 마음으로 꽃집 일을 시작하지만, 일이 생각보다 바빠지자 알바를 구하게 된다. 외모를 중시하는 형서의 눈에 차지 않아 번번이 실패하던 중 마침내 취향에 맞는 알바생, 정원을 고용하게 되고... 정원을 꼬셔보려던 형서는 정원이 술에 취하면서 생각보다 빠르게 잠자리를 가지고, 정원에게 내기를 제안하는데.

altTitles.ja: 大蜘蛛ちゃんフラッシュ・バック
ラッキー・スパイダー

description.en: First-year high school student Minoru Suzuki, who resembles his late father like two drops of water, often sees visions of his mother's past as a high school student through the eyes of his father.
description.pt-br: O estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio, Minoru Suzuki, que se parece com seu falecido pai, muitas vezes tem visões do passado de sua mãe como estudante do ensino médio através dos olhos de seu pai.

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

Ga-Yeon, a woman who was getting tired of boring men, finds herself falling into the world of the Kashan Empire and becoming the concubine of Emperor Xeros. He's handsome, fit, and he even has a cute side! This is how Ga-Yeon’s story of taming the awkward emperor begins! ♥

---

[Original PV](https://youtu.be/TttzAw-4XcE)

During the Warring States period, the demon king Gosun, who has been hiding in the Himalayas for a hundred years and has mastered evil sorcery, is aiming to conquer Japan. Shishimaru fights as the invincible ninja Kaikitsu Lionmaru with the sword given to him by Koji Kashin, Japan's greatest ninja!

Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

altTitles.en: Noa Is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

altTitles.en: Doomsday for All: Me, Virus Monarch

description.en: The world is plunged into doomsday. The entire doomsday world has turned into a cruel evolutionary game! This is the greatest opportunity and trial ground for mankind, and it is also the amusement park of gods and demons! Chen Bai was reborn and returned
description.zh: 全球陷入末日笼罩。 整个末日世界，变成了一场残酷的进化游戏！ 这是人类最大的机缘与试炼场，也是神魔的游乐园！ 陈白重生回到了末日开始的十天前！ 直接注射丧尸病毒， 觉醒SSS天赋：病毒君王！ 掌控病毒开始一条与众不同的进化之路！

description.en: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...

title.en: One Day a Message Window Appeared Out of Nowhere!?

altTitles.ja: ある日突然メッセージウィンドウが表示されたんですけど！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru Hi Totsuzen Message Window ga Hyoujisaretan desu kedo!?
Aru Hi Totsuzen Messeeji Windou ga Hyoujisaretandesukedo!?

description.en:
The protagonist, a university student named Kazuya Hayakawa woke up one day with a message window that shows up in his field of view. This window is always visible to him, and when certain lines are displayed in it, he gets thrown into confusion.

From that day onward began Hayakawa's daily ordeal of getting manipulated by this message window.

(Source: Amazon JP)
description.ja:
主人公・早川一哉はある日目が覚めるとメッセージウィンドウが見えるようになってしまった。
常に表示されるそのウィンドウにはとあるセリフが表示され主人公を混乱させる。

この日から早川一哉のメッセージウィンドウに振り回される苦難の日々が始まった。
怪奇現象や幽霊の目撃情報が絶えない呪われし丑光高等学校。この学校に赴任してきた教師・園 渚のクラスには丑光高校に伝わる百七不思議のひとつ、物部スイカという小学生（？）が居座っていた。オカルト的な噂を一切信じない園だったが、スイカに気に入られたことで不可解で笑えるトラブルに巻き込まれていく!!

description.en:
Ten years ago Yaichi's twin brother moved to Canada and married a man called Mike. A month ago, he died.  
  
Now Mike has arrived in Japan to meet Yaichi and his daughter Kana. Yaichi has to face his own preconceptions and come to terms with who his brother really was.  
  
[Official English](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/545416/my-brothers-husband-volumes-1-and-2-by-gengoroh-tagame/)

Adapted to [Live Action](https://www.cinra.net/article/column-201803-otoutonootto) in 2018.

---
- **Won the 19th Japan Media Arts Festival Division Excellence Award in 2015**
- **Won the 47th Japan Cartoonists Association Excellence Award in 2018**
description.uk:
Звичайнісінький день Яїчі Оріґучі перериває кремезний іноземець, який з'являється перед дверима і обіймає його. Чоловік представляється Майком Фленаґаном, і Яїчі швидко дізнається, що Майк — вдівець Рьоджі, його молодшого брата-близнюка. Відтоді як Рьоджі виїхав до Канади десять років тому Яїчі не чув про нього нічого, окрім того, що він одружився з іноземцем і помер місяць тому.

У той час як Яїчі занепокоєний, його маленька донька Кана в захваті від ідеї мати дядька-ґея з Канади. Нерозуміння Каною поглядів японського суспільства на гомосексуальність змушує Яїчі замислитися над власними упередженими уявленнями. І поки Майк продовжує жити в родині, Яїчі поступово дізнається більше про свого зятя і згадує своє минуле з Рьоджі.
description.pt-br: Há dez anos, o irmão gêmeo de Yaichi acabou se mudando para o Canadá. Como os dois não conversavam tanto, a viagem ao exterior só ajudou a aumentar a distância entre eles. Um mês atrás, Yaichi recebeu a notícia do falecimento de seu irmão e, pouco tempo depois, ele recebe a visita de Mike, seu cunhado. Ele viajou ao Japão para conhecer a família e os lugares de que o seu falecido marido tanto falava. Embora relutante, a família o recebe e Yaichi não só confronta os seus preconceitos com relação à homossexualidade, como também conhece um outro lado do seu irmão e passa a acompanhar como a próxima geração pode lidar com tais questões.

title.en: The Shikisaki Sisters Want to Be Exposed

altTitles.ja: 四季崎姉妹はあばかれたい

description.en: One day, Tarou Yamada, who runs a detective business, slips on a banana peel and reincarnates into Tsukushi Shikisaki, the younger brother of three beautiful big-breasted sisters who will all die on the same day. As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters, he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?
description.ja: 探偵業を営む山田太郎はある日、バナナの皮に足を滑らせてしまい、同日に命を落とした美麗三姉妹の弟・四季崎つくしに転生をしてしまう。美人三姉妹に囲まれて過ごすことになるが、四季崎つくしが三姉妹の誰かに殺されたことに気がついてしまい…!?

description.en:
**"Hyuma, be a big giant star!"**

This is the story of Hyuma Hoshi , a hot-blooded boy who endures intense, bloody training in response to his father's wish!

Adapted into Anime twice once in 1968, lasting 182 episodes and again in 1977(As Shin Star of the Giants with a follow-up), lasting a total of 75 episodes. Numerous Anime films were also produced as well as an OVA featuring a crossover with Tezuka's Atom, directed by Gundam's Yoshiyuki Tomino.

---
- **Won the 8th Kodansha Children's Manga Award in 1967**

Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

title.en: It's Not Easy to Be a Man After Traveling to the Future

altTitles.zh: 穿越未来之男人不好当

altTitles.zh-ro: Chuanyue Weilai Zhi Nanren Buhao Dang

altTitles.ru: Нелегко быть мужчиной после путешествия в будущее

description.en:
After dying from a strange terminal illness, Ling Lan was reborn into a world 10,000 years into the future. Although she dearly wished she could just live a peaceful and uneventful life in her new healthy body, fate had other plans…  
  
Forced to disguise herself as a boy just so she could inherit her deceased father’s premium military benefits, Ling Lan’s journey to adulthood was full of challenges. After much difficulty, she finally turned sixteen when she could drop the charade. But before she could grasp her newfound freedom to get married and start her own family, a twist of fate results in her being thrown into the Federation’s top military boys’ school.  
  
With these twists of fate, Ling Lan had little choice but to walk further and further down a path of no return, one of cold and aloof dominance… (NovelUpdates)
